name: Shoot Them All (GrayDuck02)
description:
W/UP: shoot

A,D/LEFT,RIGHT: move slingshot

You are a very nice slingshot, and you need to shoot as many bombs as you can in 20 seconds. But there is a catch, you only have one rock to shoot (not a bullet, because you are a slingshot, duh).

IMPORTANT: You need to have Java installed to run the game.
